website_summaries.verdict: These inspirational bookmarks are both meaningful and practical for graduation parties.
pros: Contains 60 inspirational messages from famous public figures
Sturdy cardstock with a water-resistant coating
Generous 7-inch  by 2-inch design, ideal size for a bookmark
Suitable for a number of occasions
cons: Some concerns about the quality of the artwork and fonts

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gifts!
customer_reviews.text: An absolute wonderful bookmark to use as gift-giving. The bookmarks are thick, not too thick, but good enough they don't look cheap. The messages are uplifting and the product is even better in person than the photos. My new go-to company for gift-giving!
customer_reviews.author: RyanTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I think they will be pleased.
customer_reviews.text: These bookmarks are being given tomorrow as gifts to my college student incarcerated in a prison. I think they will be pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Hood

customer_reviews.title: Cost effective
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. The material is not flimsy, instead it's sturdy and was perfect for my needs. I gave them as (low cost), yet classy tokens at a get together. I bought tassels separately and put them in. The 60 pack was quite a deal.
customer_reviews.author: Simmer

customer_reviews.title: Non religious motivational gift
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a token for my dialysis patients, non religious. This fits the bill, but is too generic for my taxes. Quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Great gifts
customer_reviews.text: Love the inspirational messages and graphics. Perfect gift for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: R.Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Good quality! Love the sayings! Great for any event where you want to give a little something. Worth every pe6!
customer_reviews.author: Cherise

customer_reviews.title: Uplifting quotes for self and others
customer_reviews.text: Excellent.. love the says..love giving out to people and use in my own books too
customer_reviews.author: rainbowheart

customer_reviews.title: Great gifts
customer_reviews.text: Gave these away as gifts to ladies at church. The pictures were vibrant and the quotes were moving. The women loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Not as nice as I thought they would be. Artwork and fonts look cheap and tacky.
customer_reviews.author: BeachCat

customer_reviews.title: ... training meeting and they were appreciated - who doesn't like a nice bookmark
customer_reviews.text: I gave these out at a training meeting and they were appreciated - who doesn't like a nice bookmark?
customer_reviews.author: Nancie E Celini

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bookmarks. I used them for an outreach program and everyone loved them.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Inspirational bookmarks
customer_reviews.text: The bookmarks had great inspirational messages. They were given as favors at an 80th birthday party. They put a smile on every guests face.
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Thick, well made, and the color is beautiful. Only thing, I wish they either didn't have holes for a ribbon or had ribbons with it.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Shoemaker
